DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Developing questionnaire use assess quality life among people family member cancer may help study cancer future . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study quality life among family member cancer patient .
DOC.brief_title: Family Quality Life Among Families With Member Who Cancer Patient
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Develop conduct preliminary validation Family Quality Life Questionnaire use family adult cancer patient , measure appropriate use research clinical assessment purpose . - Generate initial item pool measure ( step 1 ) . - Reduce item pool base content validity assessment ( step 2 ) . - Assess psychometric property dimensionality measure ( step 3 ) . OUTLINE : - Step 1 ( item generation ) : Items generate literature review semi-structured interview patient family . The purpose interview determine whether five domain identify literature review ( family interaction , family role , family communication , family emotional support , overall family quality life [ FQOL ] ) central area FQOL , determine important FQOL domain affect cancer treatment . Patients family member interview individually 45-60 minute . The initial item pool generate base literature review interview . - Step 2 ( item review reduction ) : The initial item pool examine reduce base content validity . Ten health care provider minimum five year experience work cancer patient rate content validity propose questionnaire . Experts receive packet questionnaire , include objective study , propose questionnaire develop step 1 , propose questionnaire format modify examination content validity . The content validity version use 4-point Likert format ass item 's relevance , sufficiency ( i.e. , extent fully cover intended domain ) clarity relation construct ( FQOL domain ) suppose ass . Experts ask rate overall format questionnaire regard ease use appropriateness , open-ended comment suggestion . Items modify drop base expert ' review . - Step 3 ( final item selection psychometric evaluation ) : Patients family member complete FQOL questionnaire develop previous step questionnaire prove reliability validity baseline . Other questionnaire include SF-36 ( general QOL survey use widely general population sample patient , include cancer patient ) , FACT-G patient ( instrument use ass health-related QOL cancer patient ) , version FACT-G modify Northouse family member , Family Interaction Emotional Well-Being subscales ( examine family interaction family emotional support cancer family ) Beach Center Family Quality Life Scale ( FQOL measure family disable child ) , Balanced Cohesion subscale ( examine family interaction cancer family ) FACES IV ( ass balance unbalanced family cohesion family flexibility general population ) , Family Communication Scale ( general survey use assess family communication general population ) . Patients family member complete FQOL 2 week initial assessment . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 210 cancer patient 210 family member accrue study .
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose local , advanced , metastatic cancer require simple surgical procedure Ten family adult patient breast , prostate , lung , colon , head neck cancer interview step 1 portion study An available adult family member willing participate study The term family define broadly include adult 21 year age , consider cancer patient family member , provide care support and/or share cancer experience patient Family member need biologically relate patient relate marriage , may may live house patient Able read , write , speak English PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
